articles.name: Taxi at dawn
articles.digest: I saw the driver coming out of the back seat, turning around and reaching in, pulling out a blanket and folding it up.

articles.name: Toyko 7 days Solo Travel Guide
articles.digest: It’s a busy and enriching trip in Toyko, all are fresh experiences for me as a foreigner. I’d like to share the itinerary with you for reference.

articles.name: 山海印象
articles.digest: 基隆港口的海有一股机油味，淡水码头的海充满了烟火气息，南部的海岸阳光明媚，花莲的海潮又汹涌澎湃，呼啸而来，退人三舍。

about: Thank you for visiting my page. If you've scrolled here, you probably already know me. I'm Drinking, a full-stack indie developer based in Shanghai. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions and exploring the world of technology. Feel free to reach out and connect with me at bytegush@hotmail.com.
